channel.title: 317 shop problem. (skillcape)
channel.description:
Hey there, I made a shop in my 317 source and for some reason when I put the items as the skillcape codes it wont load my server but it will allow any other items. I am coding it correct it's just the skillcape id codes that are the problem.
Any ideas?

item.title: 317 shop problem. (skillcape)
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

Delta,

Shop code:

shop = 44	Skillcape_shop	2	2	14074 1      	14077	1	14080 1     	10483	1	14086 1	     14089	1	14092	1	14095	1	14098	1	14101	1	14104	1	14107	1	14109	1	14116	1	14119	1	14122	1	14125	1	14128	1	14131	1	14137	1	[/code]		

Autospawn code:
[code=lscript]spawn	= 519	3206	3417	0	0	0	0	0	0	1 [/code]

Code in client.java (source/server side).
[code=lscript]} else if(NPCID == 519) {
			 	PutNPCCoords = true; 
				WanneShop = 44; //SkillCape Shop [code]
